overview: 2020. A raging pandemic. A country in crisis. A world on the brink of collapse. For many, this was the darkest moment of their lifetime. Everyday was filled with loneliness and hopelessness. For so long, it seemed that there was no one in sight. People began to lose hope that life could return to normal ever again. Until one day, an incredible new case for hope arrived. so we could all finally start living again.
title: Summer 2021
